participant_1.background: i've an allergy to water. i am working on a building a robot to be my body double. i am a recluse. i helped design the game starcraft.

participant_2.background: i remember when nobody had a television. i love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight. i am very strong for my age. i'm 100 years old. i feel like i might live forever.

content.text: Do you like to get from life as as you can ;) ?
